entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 2 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 February 2023
